description.text:
Mira速Mag, Negative Resist Coated magnesium plates are some of the best in the industry.

UEI constantly works to improve our product quality. Unlike many negative resist magnesium plates on the market, our negative resist plates can hold fine line resolutions equally as well as positive resist plates!
sizes: 18" x 24" x .276" (457.2mm x 609.6mm x 7.00mm) - 8 Sheets per case
